mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INQUIRY (MEMBER_NUM, INQUIRY_TITLE, INQUIRY_CONTENT, INQUIRY_TYPE, INQUIRY_REGDATE) VALUES (#{memberNum}, #{inquiryTitle}, #{inquiryContent}, #{inquiryType}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM INQUIRY WHERE INQUIRY_STATE='처리중' AND MEMBER_NUM=#{memberNum} AND INQUIRY_NUM=#{inquiryNum}

SELECT inquiry_num, inquiry_title, MEMBER.member_num, inquiry_content, inquiry_type, inquiry_state, inquiry_answer, inquiry_regdate, member_email, member_nickname FROM INQUIRY JOIN MEMBER USING (member_num) WHERE INQUIRY_NUM=#{inquiryNum}

SELECT member_num, inquiry_num, inquiry_title, inquiry_content, inquiry_type, inquiry_state, inquiry_regdate FROM (SELECT member.member_num, inquiry_num, inquiry_title, inquiry_content, inquiry_type, inquiry_state, inquiry_regdate, row_number() OVER (ORDER BY inquiry_regdate DESC) AS rNum FROM INQUIRY JOIN MEMBER USING (member_num) WHERE member_num=#{memberNum}) INQ WHERE rNum BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY inquiry_regdate DESC
